title: maN maDandai
sahitya:
maN maDandai malar mangai maNALanukku mangaLam mInAgi AmaiyAgi pinnum oru EnamAgi
 vaNNamuru kuraLAga vandavanukku mangaLam naNNumanbarukkaruL shoriyum naraharikku mangaLam


anupallavi



caraNam 1    pannu vEda parashu rAmanukku mangaLam bhAnukula tilaka rAmanukku mangaLam
 balrAmanuDan bAla krSNanukkum mangaLam bhaktar kali tIrkkum kalki paramanukkum mangaLam
    caraNam 2    IraindavatArattirkku mangaLam avan IrAru nAmattirkkum mangaLam adai
 uraippOrkkum kETpOrkkum jaya mangaLam jaya mangaLam nitya shubha mangaLam
